20110117140216.000|20110117140218.000|TR0|
20110117140218.000|20110117140221.000|TR0|Johnson  &  Johnson is pulling about 43 
20110117140221.000|20110117140223.000|TR0|million of packages of certain type of 
20110117140223.000|20110117140226.000|TR0|Tylenol, Sudafed, Benadryl and more.  It's 
20110117140226.000|20110117140228.000|TR0|another hurdle for the drug company that 
20110117140228.000|20110117140231.000|TR0|has spent over a century building a name 
20110117140231.000|20110117140233.000|TR0|based on quality.  Honchos (ph) say this 
20110117140233.000|20110117140236.000|TR0|recall only affects wholesalers, that 
20110117140236.000|20110117140238.000|TR0|consumers don't need to be worried.  But 
20110117140238.000|20110117140241.000|TR0|it's been a string of turbulent months for 
20110117140241.000|20110117140243.000|TR0|Johnson  &  Johnson.
20110117140243.000|20110117140246.000|TR0|
20110117140246.000|20110117140248.000|TR0|The company has recalled St. Joseph's 
20110117140248.000|20110117140251.000|TR0|aspirin, Rolaids and even bubble gum 
20110117140251.000|20110117140253.000|TR0|flavored Tylenol melt-away strips.

20110117140256.000|20110117140258.000|TR0|as we all know.  But this may threaten its 
20110117140258.000|20110117140301.000|TR0|reputation.

20110117140308.000|20110117140310.000|TR0|over-the-counter remedies that a lot of us

20110117140330.000|20110117140333.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  Well, here, this is a 
20110117140333.000|20110117140335.000|TR0|company that says since the 1940s has

20110117140338.000|20110117140340.000|TR0|premium for these products because you

20110117140343.000|20110117140345.000|TR0|going to give you something a little bit

20110117140350.000|20110117140353.000|TR0|go-to for moms, dads, doctors and nurses 
20110117140353.000|20110117140355.000|TR0|has been pulled from the shelves for over

20110117140726.000|20110117140729.000|TR0|election.  Duvalier is supposed to talk to

20110117140741.000|20110117140744.000|TR0|then declared himself president for life.

20110117141110.000|20110117141113.000|TR0|the night trying to get those roads reopen.
20110117141113.000|20110117141115.000|TR0|

20110117144404.000|20110117144406.000|TR0|PHILLIPS:  A decade ago, the World Health 
20110117144406.000|20110117144409.000|TR0|Organization said to feed newborns just 
20110117144409.000|20110117144411.000|TR0|breast milk for the first six months.  But 
20110117144411.000|20110117144414.000|TR0|some British researchers are worried this 
20110117144414.000|20110117144416.000|TR0|could lead to iron deficiency and that 
20110117144416.000|20110117144419.000|TR0|babies could be prone to allergies.  The 
20110117144419.000|20110117144421.000|TR0|authors suggest introducing solids as 
20110117144421.000|20110117144424.000|TR0|early as four months.  And if you want to 
20110117144424.000|20110117144426.000|TR0|bump the odds that your kids will eat 
20110117144426.000|20110117144429.000|TR0|leafy vegetables, they say, introduce 
20110117144429.000|20110117144431.000|TR0|bitter tastes early on.
20110117144431.000|20110117144434.000|TR0|
20110117144434.000|20110117144436.000|TR0|For millions of women, when PMS strikes, 
20110117144436.000|20110117144439.000|TR0|it disrupts their daily routine -- 
20110117144439.000|20110117144441.000|TR0|irritability, depression, abdominal 
20110117144441.000|20110117144444.000|TR0|cramps, headaches. Well, now Brazilian 
20110117144444.000|20110117144446.000|TR0|researcher say they've found evidence a 
20110117144446.000|20110117144449.000|TR0|cocktail of fatty acids can actually help 
20110117144449.000|20110117144451.000|TR0|mitigate those symptoms.  They say women
